blogPost.title: Why is diversity important in data science? Answer by Ashok Srivastava, Chief Data Officer @Intuit. https://t.co/gByUpyN258 https://t.co/38LDi6mjdY
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: データサイエンスではなぜ多様性が重要なのでしょうか？Answer by Ashok Srivastava, Chief Data Officer @Intuit. https://t.co/gByUpyN258 https://t.co/38LDi6mjdY
为什么多样性在数据科学中很重要？回答者：Ashok Srivastava，首席数据官@Intuit。https://t.co/gByUpyN258 https://t.co/38LDi6mjdY
爲什麼多樣性在數據科學中很重要？回答者：Ashok Srivastava，首席數據官@Intuit。https://t.co/gByUpyN258 https://t.co/38LDi6mjdY

previous.title: What should aspiring filmmakers know about getting their movie made? Answer by Joe Raffa, writer and director. https://t.co/TsT6YVbudU https://t.co/bzEyn5Pyt5

localize.full_text: 映画監督を目指す人が、映画を作るために知っておくべきことは何ですか？Answer by Joe Raffa, writer and director. https://t.co/TsT6YVbudU https://t.co/bzEyn5Pyt5
有抱负的电影人在制作电影时应该知道什么？回答者：Joe Raffa，作家兼导演。https://t.co/TsT6YVbudU https://t.co/bzEyn5Pyt5
有抱負的電影人在製作電影時應該知道什麼？回答者：Joe Raffa，作家兼導演。https://t.co/TsT6YVbudU https://t.co/bzEyn5Pyt5

next.title: How can we make college more affordable for Americans? Answer by @MaryDalyEcon, President & CEO @sffed. https://t.co/TWieQetsBK https://t.co/RJUnLxQW2L

localize.full_text: どうすればアメリカ人が大学に通えるようになるのでしょうか？Answer by @MaryDalyEcon, President & CEO @sffed. https://t.co/TWieQetsBK https://t.co/RJUnLxQW2L
我们如何才能使美国人更能负担得起大学？回答者：@MaryDalyEcon, President & CEO @sffed. https://t.co/TWieQetsBK https://t.co/RJUnLxQW2L
我們如何才能使美國人更能負擔得起大學？回答者：@MaryDalyEcon, President & CEO @sffed. https://t.co/TWieQetsBK https://t.co/RJUnLxQW2L
